remarks: Property of a functional with a closed kernel.  Note that ` ( L `` G ) = V ` means the functional is zero by ~ lkr0f . (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-2015.)
statement:

lcfl6.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lcfl6 $p |- ( ph -> ( G e. C <-> ( ( L ` G ) = V \/ E. x e. ( V \ { .0. } ) G = ( v e. V |-> ( iota_ k e. R E. w e. ( ._|_ ` { x } ) v = ( w .+ ( k .x. x ) ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
